Original:

The consumption is not low, but it is not limited to dine, and the atmosphere is good. It is close to the MRT Happiness Station. The overall CP value is high.

Original:
2021.2.19來訪...頭前國中對面2020新開的一間低調隱密網美店，注重客人隱私與舒適的老闆娘告知：落地窗有裝隔熱紙與防窺，即使大太陽來也很舒適，外面的人也看不到裡面喔。

白天是優雅的咖啡廳，晚上搖身一變為小酒吧，可以邊看電視聊天。

挑高兩層樓的空間視覺上不會有壓迫感，巧妙的裝潢把冷氣管營造成工業風，粉色的牆壁用橡木桶裝飾，充電插座是少了點。廁所僅一間但空間大且乾淨有附消毒酒精可以擦馬桶喔。配合著歐洲音樂，輕飲杯香氣四溢的茶，即使在充滿繁忙的車道交界處，也聽太不到車聲，悠閒坐在沙發椅上別有一番滋味，適合三五好友慢慢坐在這閒聊喔～

老闆娘待客親切，食物好吃。下午茶套餐260 ，茶飲可以重複充泡。推薦香腸是用石版烤箱製作好吃但不油膩。

周一公休 營業時間13:00－00:00 ，無限時沒壓力，19:00前是低銷一杯飲料，後是低銷400。
地址：242新北市新莊區思源路482號
EN:
2021.2.19 Visit ... A low -key hidden secret network beauty store opposite the head of the middle middle school, and the owner of the guest who pays attention to the privacy and comfort of the guests informs: the floor -to -ceiling windows are equipped with heat insulation paper and anti -peeping. Comfortable, people outside can't see inside.

During the day, it is an elegant cafe. It turns into a small bar at night, and you can watch TV chat.

The two -story space will not have a sense of oppression visually. The clever decoration makes the air -conditioned pipes into industrial style. The pink wall is decorated with oak barrels. The charging socket is less.There is only one toilet, but the space is large and clean with disinfection alcohol to wipe the toilet.With European music and drinking cups with full aroma, even at the junction of busy lanes, I can't hear the sound of the car. Sitting on the sofa chair leisurely, it is suitable for three or five friends to sit here and chat here. Oh ~

The boss is cordial and the food is delicious.Afternoon tea set is 260, tea can be repeatedly filled.It is recommended that sausages are made with a stone version of the oven but not greasy.

On Monday, the business hours were open from 13: 00-00: 00, and there was no pressure in infinite time. Before 19:00, it was a low -selling drink, and the latter was 400.
Address: No. 482, Siyuan Road, Xinzhuang District, New Taipei City

Original:
點了肉桂捲奶油起司佐rum口味、檸檬塔、熱美式、熱摩卡、香腸（泡菜飛魚卵、剝皮辣椒、芥末櫻花蝦），都很好吃，超乎預期。

肉桂捲（180元）偏甜、稍濕黏，雖然我不喜歡那麼甜的，但感覺得出用心。檸檬塔（180元）偏酸，塔皮酥脆。熱美式（120元）很香，順口。熱摩卡（180元）最上層有鮮奶油跟巧克力醬，不膩口，本體可不加糖，好喝。下午茶套餐有260跟280兩種價位，價格合理。

鹹食的香腸有八種口味，我們點的三種（180元），除了剝皮辣椒一般之外，另外兩種都很好吃。

服務不錯，環境舒適，是會想帶親友再訪的店。
EN:
Order cinnamon cream cheese, Rum flavor, lemon tower, hot American, hot mocha, sausage (kimchi flying fish eggs, peeling pepper, mustard cherry shrimp), all delicious, beyond expectations.

The cinnamon roll (180 yuan) is sweet and slightly wet. Although I don't like so sweet, I feel attentive.The lemon tower (180 yuan) is sore and the tower is crispy.Hot American (120 yuan) is very fragrant and smooth.The top layer of the hot Mocka (180 yuan) is fresh cream and chocolate sauce. It is not greasy, the body can not be sugar, and it is delicious.The afternoon tea set is 260 and 280, and the price is reasonable.

There are eight flavors of salty sausages. Three types of ordered (180 yuan). Except for peeling peppers, the other two are delicious.

The service is good and the environment is comfortable.

Original: 位於台北郊外新開發社區的氛圍涼爽而美好的酒吧。食物很美味，雞尾酒獨特且易於飲用。強烈推薦。
EN: The atmosphere of the newly developed community in the outskirts of Taipei is cool and beautiful.The food is delicious, the cocktails are unique and easy to drink.Strongly recommended.

Original: 環境很好。英語友好，雞尾酒也很棒！工作人員隨時為您提供協助。如果我在城鎮的那邊，我會回來的。
EN: The environment is very good.English and friendly, cocktails are also great!The staff will assist you at any time.If I am in the town, I will come back.

Original: 完美的下午茶。
EN: Perfect afternoon tea.

Original: 伴隨著美妙的音樂喝一杯的好地方，你可以和親愛的朋友在這裡享用優質的紅酒、生啤酒和法國起司。
EN: With a wonderful place for a wonderful music, you can enjoy high -quality red wine, raw beer and French cheese with your dear friends.

Original: 閒逛食物和飲料的好地方。  氣氛溫馨舒適。
EN: Walking out of food and drinks.The atmosphere is warm and comfortable.

Original: 不錯的酒吧和舒適的地方。對於想要與朋友和熱情的主人一起度過輕鬆時光的當地人來說，位置超級方便。
EN: Good bars and comfortable places.For locals who want to spend relaxed time with friends and enthusiastic owners, the location is super convenient.

Original: 精選音樂、啤酒和雞尾酒！值得再次光顧！
EN: Select music, beer and cocktails!It is worth visiting again!
